content: I am no fan of Trump and would not be upset to see him impeached. There is nothing here though. Those who pursue this type of thing are embarrassing themselves. They are showing their hand too much. The American people don’t have much patience for those who are going to oppose someone no matter what. You can’t be outraged because he draws breath. Plus the outrage makes them look like hypocrites because their side has a long list of politicians who have certainly fattened their bank accounts since becoming “public servants.”
